steps.plaintext: Go to your destination and use the feather
steps.markdown: Go to your destination and use the feather

steps.plaintext: Listen in on the locals' conversations (0/3)
steps.markdown: Listen in on the locals' conversations (0/3)

steps.plaintext: Use the feather to search for clues
steps.markdown: Use the feather to search for clues

steps.plaintext: Solve the mystery of the stones
steps.markdown: Solve the mystery of the stones

substeps.plaintext: Use the Peculiar Pinion on the Mysterious Carving to spawn an Electro Seelie.
substeps.markdown: Use the Peculiar Pinion on the ◀Mysterious Carving▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Mysterious_Carvings▷ to spawn an ◀Electro Seelie▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Electro_Seelie▷.

substeps.plaintext: Follow the Electro Seelie until it spawns another Mysterious Carving.
substeps.markdown: Follow the Electro Seelie until it spawns another Mysterious Carving.

substeps.plaintext: Use the Peculiar Pinion on the Mysterious Carving. Ishine Script will appear on the cliff wall.
substeps.markdown: Use the Peculiar Pinion on the Mysterious Carving. ◀Ishine Script▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Languages#Ishine_Script▷ will appear on the cliff wall.

substeps.plaintext: Hit the stones at the previous location in the same order as the script on the cliff wall (left to right).
substeps.markdown: Hit the stones at the previous location in the same order as the script on the cliff wall (left to right).

steps.plaintext: Use the feather to search for clues
steps.markdown: Use the feather to search for clues

steps.plaintext: Restore the stones and solve the puzzle
steps.markdown: Restore the stones and solve the puzzle

substeps.plaintext: Move the stones until they stop in front of the tiles with the same Ishine Script.
substeps.markdown: Move the stones until they stop in front of the tiles with the same Ishine Script.

steps.plaintext: Use the feather to search for clues
steps.markdown: Use the feather to search for clues

steps.plaintext: Use the feather to search for clues
steps.markdown: Use the feather to search for clues

substeps.plaintext: Follow the 3 Seelies and pick up the respective Autake Slates. The Seelies will return to their original locations after the slates are obtained.
substeps.markdown: Follow the 3 ◀Seelies▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Seelie▷ and pick up the respective Autake Slates. The Seelies will return to their original locations after the slates are obtained.

steps.plaintext: Return the stones to their rightful place
steps.markdown: Return the stones to their rightful place

steps.plaintext: Solve the mystery of the stones
steps.markdown: Solve the mystery of the stones

substeps.plaintext: Hit the stones in the same order as the script on the pillar (top to bottom).
substeps.markdown: Hit the stones in the same order as the script on the pillar (top to bottom).
